reviews.text: I use this station once a week, the staff are very helpful and there always seem to be a lot of staff. Only problem is when I return it's very confusing to get out of station, more than once I've come out of wrong wit and ended up by civic centre
My daughter fainted on a platform at Newport station yesterday. Staff could not have been more helpful and considerate. Thank you everyone!

A recently refurbished 4 platform train station that in my opinion will be fine for every day use but buckles under the pressure of international sport matches. Not enough places to buy tickets and not enough entrances to swipe in lead to long wait times. Saying that the station was clean and well signposted with disabled access throughout. Guards on duty were very helpful. Long stay parking changes are very high. £10 for full day.
Quite clean. Cafe, toilets, trains etc. What more do you want?
A mandatory station to pass if going from Wales to south or east England unless you want a much longer route.
